content: Announcement: AU Base IG static build is published to http://hl7.org.au/fhir/base2018Mar/ to support provider directory IG work and HL7 Australia connectathon event planned for April. NOTE: CI build of base IG http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/ is currently offline pending changes to IG builder with fixes
only technical corrections will be made to the snapshot static build branch of the AU Base IG leading up to events
